157540e5-3302-464a-add2-4c5c148dfb31.description: In this course you’ll be able to: Incorporate code in your Dataiku projects, Manage code across projects and instances, Connect to Dataiku from your preferred IDEs and drive Dataiku through the APIs, and Create plugins for non-coding colleagues.
157540e5-3302-464a-add2-4c5c148dfb31.name: Dataiku Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Learners complete a series of Lessons, Practice Problems, and Knowledge Checks with an average score of > 90%. Learners complete applied exercises and score at least an 80% on the exercises in order to earn the course badge. Learners complete a final capstone project of at least 80%.

9a7b2656-734c-4819-a357-9430da5a9bbc.description: In this course, you will learn proper MLOps practices and how to implement them. You will be able to recognize and avoid pitfalls while preparing projects and ML models for production, identify project refactoring and documentation techniques to perform before deploying to production, perform batch deployment, monitor, and update projects on the Automation node, design, deploy, and monitor API services, and take the MLOps Practitioner certification.
9a7b2656-734c-4819-a357-9430da5a9bbc.name: Dataiku MLOps Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Learners complete a series of Lessons, Practice Problems, and Knowledge Checks with an average score of > 90%. Learners complete a final knowledge check with an average score of > 90%

9496fac0-a026-4fa7-9c73-3c2ae4434975.description: Create, evaluate and tune ML Models with DSS Visual ML tool. Deploy your model from Lab to Flow and apply it. Understand and explain your model with Responsible AI tools. Understand basics of Model Lifecycle Management. Analyze your data with the Interactive Stats tool
9496fac0-a026-4fa7-9c73-3c2ae4434975.name: Dataiku ML Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Learners complete a series of Lessons, Practice Problems, and Knowledge Checks with an average score of > 90%. Learners complete a final knowledge check with an average score of > 90%

63b266d4-bc65-4d7c-a63d-e4e2ac67f214.description: This course is the perfect starting point for anyone who is new to ThoughtSpot. These foundational courses are designed to introduce new learners to ThoughtSpot and its place in the Business Intelligence landscape.
63b266d4-bc65-4d7c-a63d-e4e2ac67f214.name: ThoughtSpot Foundations
